narrative: Implemented CLI bridge with version checking and resilient pipeline. Added setup script, example workflow, new specifications, and documentation. These changes address critique requesting concrete commands, compatibility notes, and error handling.
user_input: Next Implementation Directive: provide working CLI, version matrix, error handling, async workflows
scene: Before, the repo only offered placeholder modules and docs. Now, contributors can run a CLI command that integrates jgtpy and jgtml, validate package versions, and follow an example workflow to test the enhanced pipeline.
